before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bag7b","text":"Decide which protein concentration to use, and create the proper LRRK2 buffers in order to obtain the right salt concentration (150 mM NaCl).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e0vk6","text":"This is Leschziner's Lab protocol for making cryo-EM grids for RCKW:DARPin complex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: Preparation of LRRK2 RCKW cryo-EM grids

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"29u53","text":"Plasma clean grids.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d67t0","text":"We used UltrAuFoil Holey Gold 1.2/1.3 300 mesh grids and plasma cleaned them in the Solarus II (Gatan) using the QuantiFoil Au preset.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"975ln","text":"Apply protein to grids and plunge freeze (3-4 uL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7q3q7","text":"We used a Vitrobot (FEI) to blot away excess sample and plunge freeze","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fd07h","text":"Store grids in liquid nitrogen until ready for imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fe834","text":"Dilute samples to desired concentration in the LRRK2 buffer. Make sure final salt is at 150 mM NaCl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":47,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cps","text":"For best results, make   samples, good for freezing 2 grids. This is to minimize time spent outside of storage buffer, reducing aggregation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pee1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"u87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"CCE2E280636511EB8B7FD5DD85302007","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}}}}
